title: Customer Reports Service Outage
description: A customer calls to report a total loss of mobile service. The agent must check for known outages and provide an estimated time for resolution.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and verify their service location using their address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer account and their primary service location.

tasks.description: Check the network status map for known outages affecting the customer's verified area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly uses the outage map tool to confirm a regional outage.

tasks.description: Inform the customer about the known outage, provide the ETR, and offer to set up an SMS notification for when service is restored.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the outage status and ETR and successfully sets up an alert.
